con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="RealTimeCRR" targetNamespace="http://realtime247.eu/realtime247/crr" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://realtime247.eu/realtime247/crr" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="urn:eu:nets:realtime247:crr:core.2015.10.14"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:eu:nets:realtime247:crr:core.2015.10.14" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:eu:nets:realtime247:crr:core.2015.10.14"> <xs:element name="ReportFault"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ReasonCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="OriginalMessage" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SendCycleReconciliationReportRequest" type="tns:CycleReconciliationReport"/> <xs:element name="SendCycleReconciliationReportResponse" type="tns:CycleReconciliationReportReceipt"/> <xs:complexType name="CycleReconciliationReport"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="MessageId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SendingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ReceivingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ServiceId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TestCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ClearingDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="CycleName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AccumulatedNumberOfPositions" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element name="AccumulatedAmountSettled" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ReportForFinancialInstitution" type="tns:ReportForFinancialInstitution"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:decimal"> <xs:attribute name="Ccy" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReportForFinancialInstitution"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccumulatedNumberOfPositions" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element name="AccumulatedAmountSettled" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="AsDebtorAgent" type="tns:ReportForDebtorAgent"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="AsCreditorAgent" type="tns:ReportForCreditorAgent"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="financialInstitutionId" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="type" type="tns:ReportType"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReportForDebtorAgent"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="NumberOfPositions" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element name="AccumulatedAmountSettled" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ReportForDebtorAgentCounterParty" type="tns:ReportForDebtorAgentCounterParty"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReportForDebtorAgentCounterParty"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DirectClearingParticipantId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="FinInstId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Pacs004Total" type="tns:TransactionTotal"/> <xs:element name="Pacs008Total" type="tns:TransactionTotal"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionTotal"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SettledTotal" type="tns:AccumulatedTotal"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AccumulatedTotal"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TotalNumber" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element name="TotalAmount" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReportForCreditorAgent"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="NumberOfPositions" type="xs:integer"/> <xs:element name="AccumulatedAmountSettled" type="tns:ActiveCurrencyAndAmount"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ReportForCreditorAgentCounterParty" type="tns:ReportForCreditorAgentCounterParty"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ReportForCreditorAgentCounterParty"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DirectClearingParticipantId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="FinInstId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Pacs004Total" type="tns:TransactionTotal"/> <xs:element name="Pacs008Total" type="tns:TransactionTotal"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CycleReconciliationReportReceipt"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OriginalMessageId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SendingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ReceivingId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TestCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="TestCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Test"/> <xs:enumeration value="Prod"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ReportType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="INST"/> <xs:enumeration value="BULK"/> <xs:enumeration value="EBA"/> <xs:enumeration value="TIPS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FailureReasonCodeType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="InvalidContent"/> <xs:enumeration value="InternalError"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="SendCycleReconciliationReport"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:SendCycleReconciliationReportRequest" name="sendCycleReconciliationReportRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SendCycleReconciliationReportResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:SendCycleReconciliationReportResponse" name="sendCycleReconciliationReportResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="RealTimeCRRPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="SendCycleReconciliationReport"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SendCycleReconciliationReport" name="SendCycleReconciliationReport"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:SendCycleReconciliationReportResponse" name="SendCycleReconciliationReportResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="RealTimeCRRSoapBinding" type="tns:RealTimeCRRPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="SendCycleReconciliationReport"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="SendCycleReconciliationReport"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="SendCycleReconciliationReportResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="RealTimeCRR"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:RealTimeCRRSoapBinding" name="RealTimeCRRPortType"> <soap:address location="https://ebs-nic-srv-daemon-s1.apps.os-global.finods.com/nic/services/RealTimeCRR"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
